title: New Pokemon Release Dates Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.26.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Pokemon, Sonic, Unreal Engine 5, and so much more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:26 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Gamescast is up right now and it’s our reviews of both Biomutant, and Knockout City!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:04:11 - We’ve got a release date for the new Pokemon games! - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:20:36 - Unreal Engine 5 Is Available Now in Early Access and there’s a Gorgeous New Tech Demo - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:26:24 - Roger Craig Smith is back voicing Sonic?? - Twitter
00:33:20 - PlayStation is Planning an Expansion Into Mobile Games and Apps - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:34:00 - What's intrigues you more: creating a unique experience with your IP for mobile gaming (like what I think Sony is doing)? Or, bringing the actual console game on the phone (like XBox Game Pass currently does)? - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:42:20 - Speaking of: PlayStation Is Developing AI ‘Agents’ That Will Play Games With You - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:46:01 - Pre-E3 keeps rolling: Far Cry 6 is getting a gameplay reveal
00:48:10 - Dreams Community convention DreamsCom returns for 2021 - @PlayStation on Twitter
00:49:20 - Out today
00:41:00 - Ad
00:52:50 - Squad Up:ALDEN (Series X) - Alden9386
00:53:10 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS (This is optional)
Another required reading: Inside IGN’s Battle for Editorial Independence - Steven Strom @ Fanbyte
00:55:02 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
